**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 540

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Any RP remaining unspent at the end of a Kingdom turn is converted into XP at a ratio of 1 to 1 (see [Step 3: Apply Kingdom XP](/Rules.aspx?ID=1812)).
</column>
